CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code: local infoPopUp = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/PopupGroup/PopupBack/PopupPanel_술래잡기2") local popUp = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/PopupGroup") local all = _EntityService:GetEntitiesByPath("/maps/술래잡기_LV2") for i, entity in pairs(all) do entity:SetEnable(false) end popUp:SetEnable(true) infoPopUp:SetEnable(true) infoPopUp:SetVisible(true)

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity local infoPopUp = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/PopupGroup/PopupBack/PopupPanel_술래잡기2") local popUp = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/PopupGroup") -------------------------------------------------------- popUp:SetEnable(false) infoPopUp:SetEnable(false) infoPopUp:SetVisible(false) local all = _EntityService:GetEntitiesByPath("/maps/술래잡기_LV2") for i, entity in pairs(all) do entity:SetEnable(true) end
